# Automate License Distribution to Groups in Wondershare Account Center

[TOC]

## Revision

| Date       | Comments        | Version Number |
| ---------- | --------------- | -------------- |
| 2025-04-10 | Create document | 1.0            |

## Introduction

> [!TIP]
>
> è¯¥æŒ‡å¼•å¯ä»¥å¸®åŠ©ä½ è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ†é…licenseç»™æŒ‡å®šGroupä¸­çš„ç”¨æˆ·



## Pre-configuration

> [!NOTE]
>
> If you have completed Pre-configuration,[Jump to Assign Team Plan for Group](#assign-team-plan-for-group)



### Add Users

#### Add a single user

![Add User-1](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Image-shack/clip_image045.jpg#800w)

A. E-mail & Roles, required fields, will be validated when submitting, cannot be submitted if empty;

![Add User-2](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Image-shack/clip_image047.jpg#400w)

B. Name & Department & Group, not required fields, will not be validated when submitting;

#### Batch import multiple users

![Import-1](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Image-shack/clip_image049.jpg#800w)

A. Download template file:

![Import-2](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Image-shack/clip_image051.jpg#800w)

B. Upload template file

![Import-3](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Image-shack/clip_image053.jpg#800w)

C. Next Step

![Import-4](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Image-shack/clip_image055.jpg#800w)

D. Select Users 

![Import-5](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Image-shack/clip_image057.jpg#800w)

### Add User Group

![Add User Group-1](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Image-shack/clip_image114.jpg#800w) 

<kbd>Group Name</kbd> Enter the name of your User Group.

<kbd>Parent Group</kbd> Select the parent group from the dropdown, which can be left blank.

<kbd>Group Administrator</kbd> Choose the administrator for the User Group. Only team members with the Owner, Admin, or Group Administrator roles can be selected.

> [!CAUTION]
>
> The hierarchy of User Groups can have a maximum of 5 levels. Levels exceeding 5 cannot be successfully set.
>
> ![CAUTION-1](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Image-shack/clip_image116.jpg#800w) 

## Assign Team Plan for Group

1. Navigate to `Team Plan`, select the account you need to manage, and click `Assign Users`
   ![Assign team plan for group-1](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Misaki/image-20250410114450046.png#800w)

2. Check the Groups you want to assign the `Team plan` to, and click `Submit`
   ![Assign team plan for group-2](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Misaki/image-20250410114732471.png#800w)

**Expected Result**: When the administrator adds users to the selected Groups, the Account Center will automatically assign the `Team Plan` to the added users.

## Advanced Setting: Set Quota

1. Navigate to `Team Plan`, select the account you need to manage, and click `Set Quota`

2. Set quotas for different groups
   ![Set Quota](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/maozuxiao/Misaki/image-20250410120004383.png#800w)
   
   > [!CAUTION]
   >
   > The total quota should not exceed the number of Licenses

**Expected Result**: Users added or synchronized to the groups will automatically receive licenses on a==first-come, first-served== basis. Once the license limit is reached, subsequent users will no longer be granted licenses.



# Thanks for choosing Wondershare!!!
